content.raw: thanks for the info! I didn’t know about unique global symbols. I did a quick grep using `nm` on the libOgre\*.so libraries to look for unique global symbols \(type `u` according to this [page](https://sourceware.org/binutils/docs/binutils/nm.html)\) and found that one of its plugins has these symbols. The symbols don’t belong to a singleton class which is what the crash msg is complaining about so I’m not sure if that plugin is the problem. I’ll investigate a bit more.
content.html: thanks for the info! I didn’t know about unique global symbols. I did a quick grep using nm on the libOgre*.so libraries to look for unique global symbols (type u according to this page) and found that one of its plugins has these symbols. The symbols don’t belong to a singleton class which is what the crash msg is complaining about so I’m not sure if that plugin is the problem. I’ll investigate a bit more.
